SINGING TUITION

ROBERT - PARENT REVIEW
"The show was wonderful last night and well done for all of your hard work.
Our daughter has loved being taught by you this year"

Katherine has taught for 12 years both in the UK and Internationally in New York, USA.
She uses her extensive experience as a performer and teacher to help others to reach their potential.
Current and past students have been selected for West End musicals, The Royal Opera House Children's Chorus,
The National Children's Choir of Great Britain (NCCGB), International music colleges and numerous musical theatre schools
and colleges both in the UK and in the US.
Katherine is happy teaching pupils of any age or ability from complete beginners to more advanced students.
She offers in person and online individual tuition from beginners to advanced students and she has designed
an effective and enjoyable online singing course which will be available online soon.
Katherine also writes a blog which singers of any ability will find useful resources.

Please get in contact for more information.

KAREN - PARENT
"My daughter is really enjoying her singing lessons. Thank you for all of your encouragement.
I saw a big difference in her confidence at the last concert.

Tailored lessons available for:
- G.C.S.E / A - level Music performance preparation
- Internationally recognised music exams including ABRSM, TRINITY and LAMDA musical theatre exams. USAS points are available at the advanced Grade 6 - 8 levels.
- Audition preparation
- Grade 5 ABRSM Music Theory preparation

Katherine has experience as an ajudicator for music fesitvals, most recetnly adjudicating
for The Cooper's Company and Coborn School School Music Festival where she selected
and awarded the winner, The Nicholas Mowatt Prize for Singing.
Katherine also has experience giving masterclasses and singin demonstrations.
She was invited to perform at specialist G.C.S.E showcase evening at The Marist Independant School.
With her wealth of experience both as a performer and as an International singing teacher
she is able to give constructive and encouraging feedback to inspire the next generation.
